oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Third Baptist Church, 2001 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Third Baptist Church located at 908 Monroe Street in Nashville, Tennessee. The building was erected in 1903 as noted on the cornerstone. The foundation is made of cut limestone. The exterior walls are red brick. The windows are Gothic sash with stained glass. The doors are wood paneled. Special features include a tower adorned with a simple cross. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Third Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
